recipesJson.name: Fearow
recipesJson.author: Ebc88
recipesJson.description:
Based off of https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/13499#terrorhawk_by_concreteriver

I bought a bunch of grapefruits 6+ months to make Terrorhawk but never could find the Jasmine. So i started playing around with the grapefruit combo and came up with this. Not real sure how to describe it guess closed thing be a passionfruit/grapefruit vanilla cream. Add sweetener if you donâ€™t find it sweet enough for your liking
